# [`rm()`]{.blue}

	[rm]{.blue}(*things*){.center}
# What it does 

The [`rm()`]{.blue} function removes an object from R's working memory.
 
# Demo code 
	```{r eval=FALSE}	life_the_universe_and_everything <- 42	rm(life_the_universe_and_everything)	```	---
